Posts.Content: Hello SaxxyD Like you I like nice underwear.  Amoena and Nicola Jane have some lovely bras and matching sets on their websites.
Posts.Title: Help with finding matching MX underwear

Posts.Content: Rebecca Can you tell me if they have pockets fitted with pockets?  These are my kind of bras - front fastening and with sporty type backs.  I'm not contemplating having a reconstruction, but if they are suitable for wearing with my prosthesis then I shall order some.
Posts.Title: Free to a good home

Posts.Content: Rebecca Thanks for your quick reply.  If only they had pockets.....
Posts.Title: Free to a good home
